definitions.definition: Anything that assures a certain outcome .
examples: Can you give me a guarantee that he will be fit for the match?

definitions.definition: A legal assurance of something, e.g. a security for the fulfillment of an obligation .
A written declaration that a certain product will be fit for a purpose and work correctly ; a warranty .
examples: The cooker comes with a five-year guarantee .

definitions.definition: The person to whom a guarantee is made.
A person who gives such a guarantee; a guarantor .

main_definition: Anything that assures a certain outcome .
secondary_definitions: A legal assurance of something, e.g. a security for the fulfillment of an obligation .
( specifically ) A written declaration that a certain product will be fit for a purpose and work correctly ; a warranty .
The person to whom a guarantee is made.
( colloquial ) A person who gives such a guarantee; a guarantor .
